title: Encanto
description: A magical family in Colombia lives in an enchanted house—except one girl born without powers.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: Queen Ramonda and her allies fight to protect Wakanda from world powers after King T’Challa’s death.

title: Soul
description: A jazz musician's soul gets separated from his body and explores the afterlife.

title: Toy Story 4
description: Woody and the gang welcome a new toy named Forky and go on a road trip of discovery.

title: Doctor Strange
description: After a car crash, a surgeon discovers a hidden world of magic and alternate dimensions.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish goes on a journey to rescue his son who was captured by divers.

title: Inside Out
description: A young girl's emotions—Joy, Sadness, Fear, Anger, and Disgust—struggle to help her cope with change.

title: The Lion King (2019)
description: Simba must embrace his destiny as king after the tragic loss of his father.

title: Tangled
description: Rapunzel, a girl with magical long hair, escapes her tower to discover the world.

title: Onward
description: Two elf brothers go on a quest to bring their father back for one day.
